name: UF2 Editor
description: Allows viewing and editing files in a UF2 editor
uf2editor.inspectorType: Where the data inspector should be shown in the UF2 editor.
uf2editor.maxFileSize: The max file size (in MB) that the editor will try to open before warning you.
uf2editor.dataInspector.autoReveal: Whether to auto reveal the data inspector when the UF2 editor is opened.
uf2editor.defaultEndianness: The endianness selected when loading the editor.
uf2editor.columnWidth: The number of bytes per row to show in the editor.
uf2editor.showDecodedText: Whether decoded text should be shown in the editor.
uf2editor.showOpenFileButton: Show UF2 Editor button in editor menu.
uf2Editor.openFile: Open Active File in UF2 Editor
uf2editor.copyType: Sets the default format in which bytes are copied
